Class FileBodyWriter

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.http.server.body.FileBodyWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageBodyWriter<File>, ResponseBodyWriter<File>
@Internal @Singleton public final class FileBodyWriter extends Object implements ResponseBodyWriter<File>
Body writer for Files.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher

    • writePiece

      public CloseableByteBody writePiece(@NonNull ByteBodyFactory bodyFactory, @NonNull HttpRequest<?> request, @NonNull HttpResponse<?> response, @NonNull Argument<File> type, @NonNull MediaType mediaType, File object)
      Description copied from interface: ResponseBodyWriter
      Write a piece of a larger response, e.g. when writing a Publisher or a part of a multipart response. In this case, response headers cannot be modified.
      Specified by:
      writePiece in interface ResponseBodyWriter<File>
      Parameters:
      bodyFactory - The buffer factory
      request - The request
      response - The response this piece is part of
      type - The type of this piece
      mediaType - The media type of this piece
      object - The piece to write
      Returns:
      The response bytes
